ISSUE.TITLE: Searching by encoded keywords (full description)
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: For example, the word "vitlök" is encoded as "vitl& ouml;" (remove space) in the editor on a product details page (Swedish characters). And when you search by "vitlök", then nothing will be found. Looks like we also have to encode entered keywords - SearchTermAutoComplete and Search. But it's encoded in full description only (not in "short description" or "name"). ticket 12875 from premium support
